attributes.action: To permantely lower all higher education related fees as to allow for less student debt
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petition, if it succeeds, will lower all costs related to higher education. This covers: Tuition Fees, Accomadation, ETC. This will mean lower student debts lowering the chance of further debts in the future.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
